column4: I can copy a load of files into a single file with  find . -name "*.txt" -exec cat {} >> somefile \;  How do I use echo to seperate the files with ""
you can't seperate like that, you'd have to use something like sed or cut to seperate out using "" as a delemeter
maybe a for loop with grep would also work but I can't see it in my head now
I have been looking at the sed manpage. I am a newbie and cannot work out how to apply it. Do you know the correct syntax for my use case?
